items.content_html: Universal Resource Finder A global platform designed to help users discover free, high-quality resources across various categories like technology, design, education, and business. This lightweight and community-driven website makes it easy to find tools, templates, courses, and more from trusted sources. Key Features: Powerful Search: Instantly

This lightweight and community-driven website makes it easy to find tools, templates, courses, and more from trusted sources.  Key Features: Powerful Search: Instantly

items.content_html: onlyjs is a lightweight JavaScript library for fast and easy UI development. It allows you to quickly create, style, and render HTML elements with minimal code, making DOM manipulation effortless and efficient.
items.title: i24k3/onlyjs: onlyjs is a lightweight JavaScript library for fast and easy UI development. It allows you to quickly create, style, and render HTML elements with minimal code, making DOM manipulation effortless and efficient.

items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
items.title: DraouM/StockFlow: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.

items.content_html: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
items.title: hashir-ayaz/codebase-rag: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
